questions: If m is 80 degrees, what is the measure of the angle which forms adjacent angle pair with m?

option3: PR is the longest side of the triangle

questions: Which of the following statements best describes theoretical probability?
option1: The probability based on the outcomes of an actual experiment or trial.
option2: The probability based on observed frequencies from past events.
option3: The probability calculated by dividing the number of favourable outcomes by the total number of possible outcomes.
option4: The probability determined by conducting simulations and experiments.

questions: Consider the data set: 10, 15, 18, 22, 25, 27, 30. What is the median of this data set?
